text: 10.37-38 Mat 3.16, 4.12-17, Luk 4.14, 4.17-20, Jon 3.2, Hib 1.9 Tap anɨb anɨb gak ak man Yislel, bɨ ogɨnap agel nepɨm agak. Ned Jon Bɨ Ñɨg Pakñeb ak ñɨg pakñɨlɨg, takaw tep agñak agak. Kɨdek, tap anɨb okok jɨj gɨl gak, Galili plopens agak. Bɨ Jisas taun Nasalet nɨb, God ayɨp mɨdɨl nop aglup ak, God ne Kawnan ne ak Jisas nop yokek kod yek agak. Ne man okok ajɨl, binɨb yokɨp okok dɨtep gɨlɨg, binɨb kɨcheki bɨawl ak gek koslam yelak okok kɨlop gek, suŋ lak agak. Anɨgek, takaw anɨb ak ag dad amɨl, ag dad amɨl, binɨb Judiya mɨdebal okok mɨdupsek nɨgɨlak agak.
